pages.text: Before you can begin crafting any plushables you will need some specific resources.$(br2)The first is copper, which can be obtained by smelting raw copper mined from below ground.

A plushable builder is crafted with 4 copper ingots, red and yellow dye, 2 redstone dust and a loom.$(br2)This block is used to create every single plushable.$(br)Once you've crafted one, every plushable recipe will be unlocked in this codex.
